from collections import Counter

n = int(input())
s = input()

counter = 0

for i in Counter(s).values():
    counter += i - 1

print(counter)

from collections import Counter

n = int(input())
s = input()

c = Counter(s)

ans = n - max(c.values())

print(ans)
n = int(input())
s = input()

ans = n - len(set(s))

print(ans)
